summary: Aeyana & Solara are followers based on DiaborMagic's published presets.  Available in CBBE, CBBE Slim, and UNP.  Solara is a combat assassin; Aeyana is a spellsword with emphasis on anti-vampire magic.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][color=#9900ff][size=6][b]Aeyana & Solara[/b][/size][/color]
[font=Verdana][i]
[color=#d5a6bd]Available Individually or Merged Pack[/color][/i]

[color=#c27ba0]Based on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/10590615/?]DiaborMagics[/url] [/color][color=#c27ba0]Character Presets Available [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76286/?]Here[/url]
[color=#c27ba0]Followers made by the request of [/color][url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/10590615-diabormagics/]DiaborMagics[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/qbvukaqo7/20170103132832_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/66aq4dojr/20161226200024_1.jpg[/img]

Name:  Aeyana
Race:  Custom Nord Based
Voice:  Female Young Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.00
Weight:  53
Body Options:  CBBE, CBBE Slim, UNP
Skin:  Fair Skin
Armor:  Gwelda Dawnguard Armor (CBBE Slim Only)
Weapons:  Dawnguard Crossbow & Fragcil
Spells:  Stendarr's Aura, Sun Fire, Vampire's Bane
Location:  Dayspring Canyon Entrance (Outside Cave Entrance)

Class:  Spellsword
Style:  Boss One Hand

[/font][font=Verdana]Levels with Player.  Nord traits/bonuses.
Skill Bonuses/Perk Trees:  Archery, Light Armor, Restoration, Block, One Handed
Tested with AFT & EFF[color=#c27ba0]
[/color]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/9ef7hfatj/20161222235831_1.jpg[/img]

Name:  Solara
Race:  Custom Nord Based
Voice:  Female Young Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.00
Weight:  66
Body Options:  CBBE, CBBE Slim, UNP
Armor:  Merta Assassin (CBBE Slim Only)
Weapons:  Dark Brotherhood Crossbow & Two Merta Daggers
Spells:  Healing Related
Location:  Falkreath - Gray Pine Goods (Usually upstairs)

Class:  Combat Assassin
Style:  Dual Wield (Only if crossbow not equipped)

Levels with player.  Nord traits/bonuses.
Skill Bonuses/Perk Trees:  Sneak, Light Armor, Restoration, Archery, One Hand/Dual Wield
Tested with AFT & EFF

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/p0jq1tk3r/Requirements.png[/img]
[b][u]Armor Versions[/u][/b]

Dawnguard
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT High Heels

[/url][b][u]No Armor Versions[/u][/b]

Dawnguard

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x4ru6k6iv/Recommended.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Facelight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77815/?]HDT Invisibility Fix

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/qn8xn1w5j/KnownIssues.png[/img]
[/url]CBBE Slim is the only body type currently with armor option

With some ENBs a skin texture difference may be noticeable between head and body.

With the Armor Versions some common HDT related problems may occur.

When traveling with both and depending on your computer limits, the brown/black face bug may appear.
Fast Travel fixed this during testing.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/fz56o7m6f/Installation.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x7bptea6f/Uninstall.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

Bethesda

*If I forgot anyone; please kindly remind me*

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/gfqean9xj/permissions.png[/img]
These followers are the combination of the work of others.  Please obtain their permissions in addition to mine.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/5jbteurnr/20170102184758_1.jpg[/img]

[color=#8e7cc3][size=4]PLEASE CHECK OUT MY OTHER FOLLOWERS:[/size][/color]
